content: Hi! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, and I can help you with electrical, plumbing, or HVAC needs. Could I get your name to get started?
Thanks, Tyler! Could you please provide your address so I can make sure you’re in our service area and get you the right help?
Yeah, I live by Pine and 8th, right next to the bakery. It’s the brick house.
Thank you! Can you give me the full street address including house number and zip code? That helps us make sure we have the exact right spot for your appointment.
Honestly I’m not sure the exact zip but the address is just 'brick house on Pine St at 8th'.
It looks like I’m having trouble with the address format. Sorry about that! I’m going to get a human on the team to help out—just a moment, please.
reason: Could not gather usable address; human assistance requested.

content: Hi Tyler, this is Judy from XYZ. Thanks for your patience! Can you please check any mail you might have on hand or a bill to confirm the street number and zip code? Even just a house number would help us get the tech to the right place.
Oh, sure! It’s 842 Pine St, and Google says the zip is 98355. Sorry about that!
Perfect, thank you! We can help with your electrical issue. What date and time would be best for our technician to come by?
Tomorrow afternoon if possible? The sooner the better—lights are flickering a ton.
We can send someone between 1pm and 3pm tomorrow—is that fine? Also, is there any gate code or special instruction for our tech?
No code, just knock—I'll be here. 1 to 3 works great, thanks!
Awesome, you're all set! You’ll receive a reminder before the appointment. If you need anything else, just text us here.
reason: Operator successfully scheduled appointment after agent address failure.
